xml.data:
Home » 1V Pārājikapāḷi » 1 Mahāvibhaṅga » 1.2 Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
1.2.4 Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
290.
1180Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī sāvatthiyaṃ kulūpako hoti, bahukāni kulāni upasaṅkamati. Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī matapatikā abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā. Atha kho āyasmā udāyī pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassā itthiyā nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Atha kho sā itthī yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ itthiṃ āyasmā udāyī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi. Atha kho sā itthī āyasmatā udāyinā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca—  “vadeyyātha, bhante, yena attho. Paṭibalā mayaṃ ayyassa dātuṃ yadidaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāran”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1181“Na kho te, bhagini, amhākaṃ dullabhā yadidaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā. Api ca yo amhākaṃ dullabho taṃ dehī”ti. “Kiṃ, bhante”ti? “Methunadhamman”ti. “Attho, bhante”ti? “Attho, bhaginī”ti. “Ehi, bhante”ti, ovarakaṃ pavisitvā sāṭakaṃ nikkhipitvā mañcake uttānā nipajji. Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā—  “ko imaṃ vasalaṃ duggandhaṃ āmasissatī”ti, niṭṭhubhitvā pakkāmi.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1182Atha kho sā itthī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—  “alajjino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dussīlā musāvādino. Ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti. Natthi imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ natthi imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, kuto imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ kuto imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, apagatā ime sāmaññā apagatā ime brahmaññā. Kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī maṃ sāmaṃ methunadhammaṃ yācitvā, ‘ko imaṃ vasalaṃ duggandhaṃ āmasissatī’ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati. Kiṃ me pāpakaṃ kiṃ me duggandhaṃ, kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī”ti?
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1183Aññāpi itthiyo ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—  “alajjino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dussīlā musāvādino…pe…  kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī imissā sāmaṃ methunadhammaṃ yācitvā, ‘ko imaṃ vasalaṃ duggandhaṃ āmasissatī’ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati. Kiṃ imissā pāpakaṃ kiṃ imissā duggandhaṃ, kassāyaṃ kena hāyatī”ti?
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1184Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ ujjhāyantīnaṃ khiyyantīnaṃ vipācentīnaṃ. Ye te bhikkhū appicchā…pe…  te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—  “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissatī”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1185Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṭipucchi—  “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, udāyi, mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsasī”ti? “Saccaṃ, bhagavā”ti. Vigarahi buddho bhagavā—  “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ. Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissasi. Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya…pe…  kāmapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto? Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya…pe…  evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha— 
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
291.
1186“Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya—  ‘etadaggaṃ, bhagini, pāricariyānaṃ yā mādisaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dhammena paricareyyāti methunupasaṃhitena’, saṃghādiseso”ti. (4:8)
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
292.
1187Yo panāti yo yādiso…pe…  bhikkhūti…pe…  ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1188Otiṇṇo nāma sāratto apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1189Vipariṇatanti rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ. Api ca rattaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetaṃ vipariṇatanti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1190Mātugāmo nāma manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ ājānituṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1191Mātugāmassa santiketi mātugāmassa sāmantā, mātugāmassa avidūre.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1192Attakāmanti attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariyaṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1193Etadagganti etaṃ aggaṃ etaṃ seṭṭhaṃ etaṃ mokkhaṃ etaṃ uttamaṃ etaṃ pavaraṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1194Yāti khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1195Mādisanti khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā vessaṃ vā suddaṃ vā.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1196Sīlavantanti pāṇātipātā paṭivirataṃ, adinnādānā paṭivirataṃ, musāvādā paṭivirataṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1197Brahmacārinti methunadhammā paṭivirataṃ.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1198Kalyāṇadhammo nāma tena ca sīlena tena ca brahmacariyena kalyāṇadhammo hoti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1199Etena dhammenāti methunadhammena.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1200Paricareyyāti abhirameyya.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1201Methunupasaṃhitenāti methunadhammappaṭisaṃyuttena.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1202Saṃghādisesoti…pe…  tenapi vuccati “saṃghādiseso”ti.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
293.
1203Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1204Itthī ca hoti vematiko…pe…  paṇḍakasaññī…  purisasaññī…  tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1205Paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1206Paṇḍako ca hoti vematiko…pe…  purisasaññī…  tiracchānagatasaññī…  itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1207Puriso ca hoti…pe…  tiracchānagato ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññī…pe…  vematiko itthisaññī…  paṇḍakasaññī…  purisasaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1208Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesānaṃ…pe… .
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
1209Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca. Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa…pe… .
Mahāvibhaṅga
Saṃghādisesakaṇḍa
Attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpada
294.
1210Anāpatti—  “cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena upaṭṭhahā”ti bhaṇati, ummattakassa ādikammikassāti.
  • 1.2.4.1 Vinītavatthuuddānagāthā
  • 1.2.4.2 Vinītavatthu
<< 1.2.3.2 Vinītavatthuup1.2.4.1 Vinītavatthuuddānagāthā >>
